summary: The walrus got a few new quotes.
descriptionHtml:
For some reason this mod got deleted 5 mins after I uploaded it. If it gets deleted again, I won\'t reupload it.

It makes the walrus talk like the guy in \"some guy yelling at cats\".

Install by putting the folder in:
C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\sound\\fx\\npc

C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\sound\\fx\\npc for windows 7

If the folders doesn\'t exist, simply create them.

[youtube]71QBfgZp4vc[/youtube]
author: serabella
